title: Dealing with a husband who is against hijab - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Sonia says how do I deal with my husband who doesn't want me to wear hijab be diplomatic be respectful but hold your grounds and remain steadfast hijab is not a personal choice it is an obligation from Allah that was mentioned in the Quran and in the prophets Sunnah sallallahu alayhi assalam no one has the right to oppose it and there is no obedience to anyone and disobeying Allah the Almighty
